description: This file contains Row Level Security (RLS) policies and security functions for a database supporting a game backend, including policies for users, zones, missions, notifications, and activity log tables.

methods.name: user_owns_zone
methods.description: Checks if a user owns a specific zone based on zone ID and user ID.

methods.name: zone_is_attackable
methods.description: Determines if a zone can be attacked by a user, based on zone ownership.

methods.name: is_authenticated
methods.description: Checks if the current user is authenticated.

calls: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zones WHERE id = zone_id AND owner_id = user_id)
SELECT owner_id INTO zone_owner FROM zones WHERE id = zone_id
